snippet: Marshawn Lynch, who had a third-quarter fumble that probably cost the Seahawks a touchdown, put Seattle ahead with a 27-yard run midway through the fourth quarter.
abstract: Seattle Seahawks running back Marshawn Lynch, who had third-quarter fumble that probably cost the Seahawks a touchdown, put Seattle ahead with a 27-yard run midway through the fourth quarter in the NFC wild card game.
lead_paragraph: Marshawn Lynch, who had a third-quarter fumble that probably cost the Seahawks a touchdown, put Seattle ahead with a 27-yard run midway through the fourth quarter.

headline.seo: Seahawks’ Lynch Atones for Fumble With Decisive Touchdown
headline.main: Lynch Atones for Fumble With Decisive Touchdown
headline.print_headline: Lynch Atones for Fumble With Decisive Touchdown
